name: cerb.ticket.move
description: An interaction for quickly moving tickets
script:
inputs:
  record/ticket:
    record_type: ticket
    required@bool: yes

start:
  await/group:
    form:
      title: Move ticket
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_group_id:
          label: To which group:
          required@bool: yes
          limit: 50
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.records
              inputs:
                record_type: group
                query: sort:name
          schema:
            layout:
              style: grid
              filtering@bool: yes
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: yes
            columns:
              selection/id:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/_label:
                label: Group
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
                  underline@bool: no
                  icon:
                    record_uri@raw: cerb:group:{{id}}
        submit:
          continue@bool: no
          reset@bool: no

  set/group:
    group__context: group
    group_id: {{prompt_group_id|round}}
  
  await/bucket:
    form:
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_bucket_id:
          label: To which bucket in {{group__label}}:
          required@bool: yes
          limit: 50
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.records
              inputs:
                record_type: bucket
                query@text,trim:
                  group.id:${group_id} sort:name
                query_params:
                  group_id@int: {{prompt_group_id}}
          schema:
            layout:
              style: grid
              filtering@bool: yes
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: yes
            columns:
              selection/id:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/_label:
                label: Bucket
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
                  underline@bool: no
        submit:
          continue@bool: no
          reset@bool: no

  set/bucket:
    bucket__context: bucket
    bucket_id: {{prompt_bucket_id|round}}
  
  record.update/ticket:
    output: updated_ticket
    inputs:
      # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/records/types/ticket/#records-api
      record_type: ticket
      record_id: {{inputs.ticket.id}}
      fields:
        group_id: {{bucket_group_id}}
        bucket_id: {{bucket_id}}
